title: Retrieve and summarize the Everglades Wading Bird Project data
description: The wader package provides functions to download and generate summaries for the count, nesting, indicator, and weather data from the Wading Bird Project. The Wading Bird Project is a long-term (and ongoing) monitoring site in the Everglades water conservation areas. The raw data files can be found at https://github.com/weecology/evergladeswadingbird.
